# cloudautomator_aws_account (Data Source)

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "cloudautomator_aws_account" "example-aws-account" {
  group_id = 123
  id = 456
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `group_id` (String) Group ID
- `id` (String) AWS account ID

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) AWS account name
